title: Adjust header “ribbit” logo letter-spacing and font size

requirements.text: Update the desktop header logo text “ribbit” typography in frontend/src/components/Header.tsx to use letter-spacing: -0.035rem and font-size: 1.7rem (keeping the existing Tilt Warp font-family and font-weight: 400 unchanged).

quotes: change the letter spacing for the ribbit logo to -0.035rem  and the font-size to 1.7rem

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/components/Header.tsx, the desktop logo span rendering the text “ribbit” uses inline style letterSpacing set to '-0.035rem'.
In frontend/src/components/Header.tsx, the desktop logo span rendering the text “ribbit” uses inline style fontSize set to '1.7rem'.
The logo continues to use fontFamily '"Tilt Warp", cursive, sans-serif' and fontWeight 400.
No other header layout/behavior changes are introduced.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT must not be edited.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Do not change the mobile logo image or its sizing/positioning.
Do not modify the Google Font loading setup in frontend/index.html.
Do not alter any other header styling, navigation, search behavior, or dropdown behavior beyond the specified typography changes.
